title: BiLumix Headlamp
text:
New Feature

  • Improved design (forehead & rear head pads) will give you a more snug and secure fit for better comfortability
  • One-touch on-off button
  • User-friendly power indicator

Specification

  • Weight: 140g
  • Brightness: Max 100,000 lux
  • Battery Life:
    • Max Intensity: About 3 hours (Continuously)
    • Mid to Low Intensity: 5 to 8 hours(Continuously)

Included Accessories

BiLumix Headlamp comes with
2 Rechargeable Batteries,1 Battery Cradle, 1 Attachable Light Source Filters (Clear) and 1 Travel Bag

Click here for the list of manual video instructions.
